page.title: 07Home Life in East Leicester.
page.content: A typical Leicester boy might describe his weekend like this: "On Saturday I dress in jeans,T-shirt & jumper. I have toast for breakfast & go to play with my friends on my bike. For lunch I might have egg,bacon & mushrooms. Later I visit town,listen to records & in the evening watch T.V. On Sunday I wear smarter clothes. We have a roast dinner. In the afternoon I may visit relatives or go to church." On Saturday Davinder gets up at 6 o' clock,bathes & prays for a quarter of an hour. "I help mum with the meal of chapati made with potato,butter,salt & mint. From 12 to 3 o'clock I go to Punjabi school where we learn to read & write Punjabi. After tea I go to play at my cousin's house. Supper is at 8 o'clock,we might have chapati & vegetables. Before bed I go to the holy room to pray."
